parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get array with all items linked to a given weapon.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command does not return loaded magazines, see [[weaponsItems]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''weaponAccessories''' weapon

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> weapon: [[String]] - primary, secondary or handgun

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [silencer, laserpointer/flashlight, optics, bipod]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[weaponAccessories]] [[primaryWeapon]] [[player]]; //["","acc_pointer_IR","optic_Aco",""]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[weaponAccessoriesCargo]], [[handgunItems]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[secondaryWeaponItems]], [[weaponsItems]], [[weaponsItemsCargo]]
</value></part></template>
<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 26, 2014 - 08:48 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
To check if currently selected muzzle has a silencer:
<code>hasSilencer = [[player]] [[weaponAccessories]] [[currentMuzzle]] [[player]] [[param]] [0, ""] != "";</code>
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on March 16, 2015 - 12:03 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Jezuro|Jezuro]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Since revision 129742, this command also returns an attached bipod.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
